title: Ithilien Trap (4U126)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gondor
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Plays to your support area. Each time a [Gondor] Man wins a skirmish, you may place a [Gondor] token here. Maneuver: Exert a minion for each [Gondor] token here (limit 3). Discard this condition.
Lore:	“He was glad he could not see the dead face.”
Rarity:	U
